edge: Julia has a crush on Napoleon but is constantly rejected by him, even in her dreams.

Frank is Julia's father and frequently barks orders at her.
Julia is instantly attracted to Grant, but mistakenly thinks he ran away when she accidentally hits him over the head with a coffee pot.
Julia seeks help from love therapist Hitch, who initially rejects her but finally agrees to transform her.
The bachelor of the dating show is revealed to be Grant.
